channel.title: A somewhat easy problem...For some of you
channel.description:
Hey, here is what's happening...
Every server I run it works both for me and people out of my network..
I got this new client and server from my friend, however, the sever runs fine but, the client doesn't load anymore than the "Connecting to update" or something like that...I was thinking maybe the client is set to address to the wrong IP, but, I looked in the Loader.java and it's heading towards the correct address.
Is there another place to check also or is there something else wrong?

item.title: A somewhat easy problem...For some of you
item.dc:creator: @Eric_E Eric E.
item.description:
@Eric_E wrote:

NVM, you don’t understand what I’m trying to explain.

Thanks for helping though, I appreciate it.

Read full topic
item.source: A somewhat easy problem...For some of you

item.title: A somewhat easy problem...For some of you
item.dc:creator: @bblind59 bblind59
item.description:
@bblind59 wrote:

are u trying 2 allow people 2 connect 2 ur server threw ur ip or threw ur no-ip ?? and maby try 2 edit it then click compile

Read full topic

item.title: A somewhat easy problem...For some of you
item.dc:creator: @Eric_E Eric E.
item.description:
@Eric_E wrote:

The compiler has nothing to do with making the server run in this situation…and the compiler is set, it already compiles correctly.

And the IP changing is the entire question I’m asking about…if there’s another place to change the IP other than Loader.java…

Read full topic
item.source: A somewhat easy problem...For some of you

item.title: A somewhat easy problem...For some of you
item.dc:creator: @bothkiller bothkiller
item.description:
@bothkiller wrote:

right click on run and compile and change it to the jdk u got 6.0.11 change it to 6.0.17 then search for 127.0.0.1 or 00.00.00 and change it to your ip it should work then

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Eric_E Eric E.
item.description:
@Eric_E wrote:

No, I posted it one time, someone couldn’t help me and no one else was posting…

Second time, I posted a redirection which Fatal Desire told me not to post directions…

Third time, this is it.

Read full topic
